body: At 3rd level, an internal alchemist gains a bonus on all saving throws against disease equal to his alchemist class bonus against poison. When he gains the poison immunity alchemist class ability, he becomes immune to disease as well. This ability replaces swift alchemy.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Internal Alchemist/Disease Resistance
name: Disease Resistance
